nodes.label: require ! (ctx . accounts . authority_054 . is_signer , CustomError :: MissingSigner) ;
require_keys_eq (ctx . accounts . stake_acc_054 . staker , ctx . accounts . authority_054 . key () , CustomError :: InvalidOwner) ;
let before_stake = ctx . accounts . stake_acc_054 . locked ;
ctx . accounts . stake_acc_054 . locked = before_stake . checked_add (amount) . ok_or (CustomError :: Overflow) ? ;
